001package io.ebean.cache;
002
003import io.ebean.annotation.CacheBeanTuning;
004import io.ebean.annotation.CacheQueryTuning;
005
006/**
007 * Options for controlling a cache.
008 */
009public class ServerCacheOptions {
010
011  private int maxSize;
012  private int maxIdleSecs;
013  private int maxSecsToLive;
014  private int trimFrequency;
015
016  /**
017   * Construct with no set options.
018   */
019  public ServerCacheOptions() {
020
021  }
022
023  /**
024   * Create from the cacheTuning deployment annotation.
025   */
026  public ServerCacheOptions(CacheBeanTuning tuning) {
027    this.maxSize = tuning.maxSize();
028    this.maxIdleSecs = tuning.maxIdleSecs();
029    this.maxSecsToLive = tuning.maxSecsToLive();
030    this.trimFrequency = tuning.trimFrequency();
031  }
032
033  /**
034   * Create from the cacheTuning deployment annotation.
035   */
036  public ServerCacheOptions(CacheQueryTuning cacheTuning) {
037    this.maxSize = cacheTuning.maxSize();
038    this.maxIdleSecs = cacheTuning.maxIdleSecs();
039    this.maxSecsToLive = cacheTuning.maxSecsToLive();
040    this.trimFrequency = cacheTuning.trimFrequency();
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Apply any settings from the default settings that have not already been
045   * specifically set.
046   */
047  public ServerCacheOptions applyDefaults(ServerCacheOptions defaults) {
048    if (maxSize == 0) {
049      maxSize = defaults.getMaxSize();
050    }
051    if (maxIdleSecs == 0) {
052      maxIdleSecs = defaults.getMaxIdleSecs();
053    }
054    if (maxSecsToLive == 0) {
055      maxSecsToLive = defaults.getMaxSecsToLive();
056    }
057    if (trimFrequency == 0) {
058      trimFrequency = defaults.getTrimFrequency();
059    }
060    return this;
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Return a copy of this object.
065   */
066  public ServerCacheOptions copy() {
067
068    ServerCacheOptions copy = new ServerCacheOptions();
069    copy.maxSize = maxSize;
070    copy.maxIdleSecs = maxIdleSecs;
071    copy.maxSecsToLive = maxSecsToLive;
072    copy.trimFrequency = trimFrequency;
073    return copy;
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Return the maximum cache size.
078   */
079  public int getMaxSize() {
080    return maxSize;
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Set the maximum cache size.
085   */
086  public void setMaxSize(int maxSize) {
087    this.maxSize = maxSize;
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Return the maximum idle time.
092   */
093  public int getMaxIdleSecs() {
094    return maxIdleSecs;
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Set the maximum idle time.
099   */
100  public void setMaxIdleSecs(int maxIdleSecs) {
101    this.maxIdleSecs = maxIdleSecs;
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Return the maximum time to live.
106   */
107  public int getMaxSecsToLive() {
108    return maxSecsToLive;
109  }
110
111  /**
112   * Set the maximum time to live.
113   */
114  public void setMaxSecsToLive(int maxSecsToLive) {
115    this.maxSecsToLive = maxSecsToLive;
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Return the trim frequency in seconds.
120   */
121  public int getTrimFrequency() {
122    return trimFrequency;
123  }
124
125  /**
126   * Set the trim frequency in seconds.
127   */
128  public void setTrimFrequency(int trimFrequency) {
129    this.trimFrequency = trimFrequency;
130  }
131}
